name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Budweiser launched a new campaign seeking to become Utah’s first official state beer and promised to release a customized can if its plan goes through.

“So let’s get Utah to make ‘Bud’ Utah’s official state beer — of Utah,” a state resident pitched.
https://t.co/8m9XmH4RTn

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @snydenydn: The feds want a judge to approve plea deals that will include prison time for Lori Loughlin and Mossimo Giannulli for their parts in a college admission scandal. 

https://t.co/5rXQEsLJ2c

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The U.S. Census Bureau lost more than a dozen laptops, which may have contained personal information whose confidentiality is protected by federal law.

https://t.co/RtQ516GqHK

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The Mets haven't committed to Steven Matz making his next scheduled start. Matz has a 14.66 ERA in August along with four straight losses. @DeeshaThosar

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Prosecutors say Golden State killer Joseph DeAngelo is faking extreme frailty ahead of his sentencing. 

Their plea to unseal a recent video allegedly showing him standing on a jail bed was denied.

https://t.co/G1gBcT1Ueb

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: A man spewing racist remarks on London’s Underground got knocked out cold.

“No, you’re Black,” the maskless man snarled at mask-wearing Black passengers.
https://t.co/o2sBbpj9LB

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Throughout the coronavirus pandemic, panic-buying has led to certain product shortages.

The newest shortage is is affecting what’s for dinner.

The price of pepperoni, the most-popular pizza topping, has risen steadily since March, according to Bloomberg.
https://t.co/nTKrdBoumn

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Video of Trump being rebuffed while attempting to hold the First Lady’s hand got the gossip mill spinning. 

Though unlike previous occasions when Melania Trump swatted away her husband’s palm, the two of them apparently wound up on the same page.
https://t.co/9Z4BV3z7t7

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: When 33-year-old Tito Velasquez arrived at the ER, he looked dead already. Infected with coronavirus, he was barely breathing.

He went on to make an improbable recovery, thanks to modern medicine and something undefinable but undeniably miraculous.
